content: I think Mark might be a little closer to Star Lord, but here goes: http://motorcycleguy.blogspot.com/2020/02/leading-ride-at-mitre-is-first-fhir-lord.html
That's awfully kind of you, Keith! I'm undeserving of this honor.

No, actually, you aren't. BUT: If you think others are deserving, please let me know. I've been told by at least three others of the contributions you've made. If you tell me three times, it must be true.
